Interface QuartoClient.GameListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiClient, QuartoTUI
Enclosing class:
QuartoClient
public static interface QuartoClient.GameListener
Callback interface implemented by the TUI. Used to notify the UI about server events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onChat(String sender, String text)
    Called when a chat message is received.
    void
    onConnected()
    Called once the client successfully connects to the server.
    void
    onError(String msg)
    Called when a protocol or connection error occurs.
    void
    onGameOver(String result, String winner)
    Called when the game ends.
    void
    onNewGame(String p1, String p2)
    Called when the server starts a new game.
    void
    onOpponentMove(int location, int piece)
    Called when a move is received.

  • Method Details

    • onConnected

      void onConnected()
      Called once the client successfully connects to the server.

    • onNewGame

      void onNewGame(String p1, String p2)
      Called when the server starts a new game.
      Parameters:
      p1 - name of player 1
      p2 - name of player 2

    • onOpponentMove

      void onOpponentMove(int location, int piece)
      Called when a move is received.
      Parameters:
      location - board index (or -1 if no placement)
      piece - next piece id

    • onGameOver

      void onGameOver(String result, String winner)
      Called when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      result - game result (VICTORY / DRAW)
      winner - winner name (empty if draw)

    • onError

      void onError(String msg)
      Called when a protocol or connection error occurs.
      Parameters:
      msg - error message

    • onChat

      void onChat(String sender, String text)
      Called when a chat message is received.
      Parameters:
      sender - sender name
      text - message text
